name: Retrieve list of Customer Remarks from a customer with no Remarks

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930019836000"
When I view the Remarks for CIF Key: "0100000930019836000"

Then the following Remarks should be returned in the list
| id | dateTime | subject | staffId | staffFullName | staffBusinessUnit | remarkLine1 | remarkLine2 | remarkLine3 | remarkLine4 | updateIndex |

children.description: Validate response: | id | dateTime | subject | staffId | staffFullName | staffBusinessUnit | remarkLine1 | remarkLine2 | remarkLine3 | remarkLine4 | updateIndex |

userStory.storyName: API to retrieve Customer Remarks List

title: Retrieve list of Customer Remarks from a customer with no Remarks

tags.name: API to retrieve Customer Remarks List
